name: Backstab Bakeoff
description:
On your marks, get set - bake!

Well. Once you manage to get enough ingredients to do so. 

Will you cooperate with your fellow finalist, and share the ingredients that pop out? Or are you a backstabbing baker, willing to do anything to get your cake finished so you can impress the judges - including... your baking idol (gasp).

Content warning: cartoon violence, swearing.

[This silly little Prisoner's Dilemma simulation explores the intersection of cooperation and protecting our own interests. It was created in 48 hours as a solo project for #KoiaGameJam 2022]
